vulnerabilities.description: Unsanitized user input used in SQL query
vulnerabilities.example: SELECT * FROM users WHERE username='admin' OR 1=1;
vulnerabilities.fix: Sanitize user input before using in SQL queries

vulnerabilities.description: Missing input validation for transaction amount field
vulnerabilities.fix: Implement input validation to ensure valid transaction amounts

vulnerabilities.description: Weak password policy for user accounts
vulnerabilities.example: Password requirements: 4-8 characters, no special characters
vulnerabilities.fix: Implement stronger password policy with longer minimum length and special character requirements
